description:
(Part 2 of 5)

The next evening my phone rings with Kody on the other end telling me he is off of work and calling me like I'd asked him to. We set up a time and I'm wondering what the fuck I'm going to do about all this 'Athletic modeling' so I get a few athletic clothes together which includes a few pairs of gym shorts, a jockstrap and some athletic socks. Kody arrives and we begin taking pictures of him in his athletic gear.

[Continued in Kody: An American Soldier 2 (3)]
title: Kody: An American Soldier 2 (2)
